__comment__: Use this config AFTER running step 2 config.
IMPORTANT:: Make sure to update the name of the files in 'create_new_dataframe_from_input_files' function.
If we pass None for 'sheet_name' parameter in reading Excel files, pandas will read ALL the sheets.
The equivalent of None in JSON file is null. That's why we are providing null below to read all the sheets in the file.

functions_to_apply.__comment__: This function will first check to make sure that the input files listed below are of
the SAME date range as the input file provided via commandline as base.
That's the only way for us to ensure that the user of this config does NOT forget to update
